aboutDesc: We focus on green technology, smart charging, AI picking robots and other innovative solutions, committed to promoting the deep integration of agriculture and new energy, and creating a sustainable future.
product1Desc: Use biomass waste for green power generation and promote circular economy.
product2Desc: Integrate PV, storage and charging to improve energy efficiency.
product3Desc: Smart robots help agricultural picking and improve productivity.
product4Desc: Smart charging network supports green travel.
footerInvite: We sincerely invite visionaries to join hands, share blue ocean opportunities, and create a sustainable future together!
address: Headquarters Address: 5-530 JALAN PINANG, 10450 GEORGETOWN, PULAU PINANG
